remarks: Define Hilbert lattice join.  See ~ chjval for its value and ~ chjcl for its closure law.  Note that we define it over all Hilbert space subsets to allow proving more general theorems.  Even for general subsets the join belongs to ` CH ` ; see ~ sshjcl .  (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
